cast.name: 埃尔弗丽德·耶利内克 Elfriede Jelinek

this_title: Elfriede Jelinek - die Sprache von der Leine lassen
trans_title: 埃尔弗丽德·耶利内克：让语言摆脱束缚
introduction: ELFRIEDE JELINEK: "Language Unleashed" Child prodigy, scandal writer, traitor of the fatherland, theatre fury, feminist, model lover, communist, pessimist, language terrorist, rebel, enfant terrible, defiler of the nest, brilliant, vulnerable artist, Nobel Prize winner.
chinese_title: 埃尔弗丽德·耶利内克：让语言摆脱束缚
foreign_title: Elfriede Jelinek - die Sprache von der Leine lassen
